title: Serious problems with Thunderbird new veeersion
content:
Serious new problems with Thunderbird Thunderbird recently changed, and while II noticed no improvements, three serious problems were introduced which will force me to abandon Thunderbird if not resolved: 1. I cannot see attachments in some emails, apparently those with multiple recipients. The attachment’s links are simply not visible.

2. The ability to adjust message magnification/font size with Conntrol “+” and “-“ has disappeared. I have to copy message contents into Word now to enlarge enough to read.


3. Messages I do not want to see (at that time) are opened uncontrollably, sometimes in large numbers. Apparently related to multiple recipients on a thread. I am wasting a lot of time closing maybe dozens of unwanted messages.

title: Thunderbird 115 Supernova can't download new messages from Gmail
content: Hi! Since the release of Supernova, I can't download my new emails, all from Gmail, in POP version (I hate IMAP). Thunderbird always check something called "activities" then when finished, nothing happens, it didn't check new messages while I have a couple on each of my 4 accounts. I haven't change anything in the options of these accounts, it was working perfectly before SuperNova, since then I have problem over problems. If it can't be fixed, I will downgrade to a previous version and block any updates to super-shit-nova.

title: Schede vuote in thunderbird
content:

La cosa è alquanto fastidiosa perché in quella posizione mi servono come promemoria, ma sistematicamente si comportano come sopra descritto e si non si riesce a capire quale mail o allegato era stato aperto.
